docs.snippet: Joseph L. Bruno, the majority leader of the New York Senate until his resignation in 2008, said after the verdict, “This system, it works.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: Joseph L. Bruno, the majority leader of the New York Senate until his resignation in 2008, said after the verdict, “This system, it works.”
docs.abstract: Joseph L Bruno, former majority leader of New York State Senate, is found not guilty on federal fraud charges, ending legal battle fought over nearly a decade.

headline.main: Bruno, Ex-State Senate Chief, Is Acquitted of Fraud in Retrial
headline.print_headline: Ex-State Senate Chief Acquitted of Fraud in Retrial; ‘This System, It Works,’ He Says
